Keyword_Barrier_Description: {c_important}{b}{u}Barriers{/u}{/b}{/c} absorb damage from all sources up to a specified amount.
Keyword_Berserk_Description: {c_important}{b}{u}Berserking{/u}{/b}{/c} grants 25% increased damage and 15% increased Movement Speed. This effect lasts up to 5 seconds.
Keyword_Blood_Orb_Description: {c_important}{b}{u}Blood Orbs{/u}{/b}{/c} Heal you for 15% of your Maximum Life when picked up.
Keyword_Chill_Description: {c_important}{b}{u}Chilled{/u}{/b}{/c} enemies have reduced Movement Speed. Repeatedly {c_important}{b}{u}Chilling{/u}{/b}{/c} an enemy will {c_important}{b}{u}Freeze{/u}{/b}{/c} it.
Keyword_Chill_Frozen_Description: {c_important}{b}{u}Chilled{/u}{/b}{/c} enemies have reduced Movement Speed. Repeatedly {c_important}{b}{u}Chilling{/u}{/b}{/c} an enemy will {c_important}{b}{u}Freeze{/u}{/b}{/c} it, preventing it from moving or attacking.
Keyword_Daze_Description: {c_important}{b}{u}Dazed{/u}{/b}{/c} enemies cannot attack or use Skills but are still able to move.
Keyword_Execute_Description: {c_important}{b}{u}Executes{/u}{/b}{/c} are a chance to instantly kill {c_important}{b}{u}Injured{/u}{/b}{/c} Non-Elites when damaging them.
Keyword_Fortify_Description: {c_important}{b}{u}Fortified{/u}{/b}{/c} characters take 10% reduced damage. You become {c_important}{b}{u}Fortified{/u}{/b}{/c} when you have more {c_important}{b}{u}Fortify{/u}{/b}{/c} than current Life.
Keyword_Freeze_Description: {c_important}{b}{u}Frozen{/u}{/b}{/c} enemies cannot move or attack. Enemies can be {c_important}{b}{u}Frozen{/u}{/b}{/c} by repeatedly {c_important}{b}{u}Chilling{/u}{/b}{/c} them.
Keyword_Healthy_Description: {c_important}{b}{u}Healthy{/u}{/b}{/c} characters have more than 80% of their Life.
Keyword_Immune_Description: {c_important}{b}{u}Immune{/u}{/b}{/c} characters cannot be damaged and all negative effects are removed and prevented.
Keyword_Injured_Description: {c_important}{b}{u}Injured{/u}{/b}{/c} characters have less than 35% of their Life.
Keyword_Overpower_Description: {c_important}{b}{u}Overpowering{/u}{/b}{/c} deals bonus damage based on the sum of your current Life and {c_important}{b}{u}Fortified{/u}{/b}{/c} Life.
Keyword_Resource_Pickup_Description: {c_important}{b}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/b}{/c} periodically damages surrounding enemies when picked up.
Keyword_Spirit_Fragment_Description: BUG THIS - POWERS SHOULD NOT KEYWORD SHADOW REALM
Keyword_Stationary_Description: BUG THIS _ SHOULD NOT KEYWORD STATIONARY
Keyword_Stealth_Description: {c_important}{b}{u}Stealthed{/u}{/b}{/c} characters cannot be directly targeted by enemies. Using an attack or taking damage will instantly remove {c_white}{b}{u}Stealth{/u}{/b}{/c}.
Keyword_Unstoppable_Description: {c_important}{b}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/b}{/c} characters have all Control Impairing Effects removed and prevented.
Skill_Primary_Agility_RootNodeTooltip: {c_important}Agility{/c} Skills maneuver you across the battlefield with adept mobility
Skill_Primary_Basic_RootNodeTooltip: {c_important}Basic{/c} Skills deal damage and are always available to cast
Skill_Primary_Brawling_RootNodeTooltip: {c_important}Brawling{/c} Skills reposition you or boost damage during a fight
Skill_Primary_Companion_RootNodeTooltip: {c_important}Companion{/c} Skills summon allies from nature to aid you in battle
Skill_Primary_Conjuration_RootNodeToolti: {c_important}Conjuration{/c} Skills summon Elemental entities to aid in battle
Skill_Primary_Core_RootNodeTooltip: {c_important}Core{/c} Skills spend Resource to deliver powerful attacks
Skill_Primary_Corpse_RootNodeTooltip: {c_important}Corpse{/c} & {c_important}Macabre{/c} Skills control the battle and manipulate the deceased
Skill_Primary_Curse_RootNodeTooltip: {c_important}Curse{/c} Skills afflict debilitating effects upon your foes
Skill_Primary_Defensive_RootNodeTooltip: {c_important}Defensive{/c} Skills mitigate damage received and increase survivability
Skill_Primary_Imbuements_RootNodeTooltip: {c_important}Imbuement{/c} Skills infuse attacks with potent Elemental effects
Skill_Primary_Macabre_RootNodeTooltip: {c_important}Corpse{/c} & {c_important}Macabre{/c} Skills control the battle and manipulate the deceased
Skill_Primary_Mastery_RootNodeTooltip: {c_important}Mastery{/c} Skills spend Mana to dominate the battlefield
Skill_Primary_Subterfuge_RootNodeTooltip: {c_important}Subterfuge{/c} Skills outwit and debilitate enemies with trickery
Skill_Primary_Ultimate_RootNodeTooltip: {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Skills shift the tide of battle and devastate your enemies
Skill_Primary_Weapon_Mastery_RootNodeToo: {c_important}Weapon Mastery{/c} Skills unleash powerful attacks that alter the battle
Skill_Primary_Wrath_RootNodeTooltip: {c_important}Wrath{/c} Skills unleash powerful effects that alter the battle
